column4: I get a really weird corrupted text problem which I think is down to my graphics griver.. I am using radeon.. is there an alternative?
01:05.0 VGA compatible controller [0300]: ATI Technologies Inc RS480 [Radeon Xpress 200G Series] [1002:5954]
it's a newish problem (on lucid lynx) so I assume it's a bug
I think its already fixed upstream in recent kernels
Yes, I had font corruption for awhile
any idea of a bug reference?
I don't think so.. I think I am just on the default
but I installed this a while ago so how do I check?
Can you do a test for me please? Do videos play ok for you? Specifically, xv output: mplayer -vo xv /path/to/some/video.ext
which part of the output do you want? http://pastebin.com/c2pCLsH5
I dont want the output, I just wanted to know if it plays ok
Try installing xorg-edgers and see if the problem goes away
ok.. thanks.. I should find the bug reference too
